Posts.Content: I started taking Letrozole a year and a half ago.  My consultant surgeon said NO alcolhol from now on.  I don't drink alcohol but is it safe to eat foods at Christmas that contain alcohol such as Christmas cake?
Posts.Title: letrozole and foods that contain alcohol

Posts.Content: Hi Aprillee I feel the same.  The truth is that we never know if we have kicked cancer's ass.  We just hope that we have! All the best jimmyjam
Posts.Title: The phrase " kicked cancers Ass"

Posts.Content: Great decision!  Who would do housework when they have knitting, crochet, quilting etc to do?    Not me. Enjoy jimmy jam  x
Posts.Title: Crafts and BC

Posts.Content: I have been taking Letrozole for nearly a year and a half and I look as though I've had a perm even though I just wash my hair and let it dry naturally.  Loving it!
Posts.Title: Embracing chemo curls

Posts.Content: Hi Shirl3 I had a lumpectomy 18 months ago and was told by my breast cancer nurse to wear only nightwear that buttoned down the front.  Good luck for your op.  I was fine after mine.
Posts.Title: What to wear after a lumpectomy
